It is bordered to the northeast and east by the Red Sea, Sudan to the west, Ethiopia to the south, and Djibouti to the southeast. Eritrea lies between latitudes 12째 and 18째N, and longitudes 36째 and 44째E. The country is virtually bisected by a branch of the East African Rift.
